name: Airborn Artistic II - A Second Take
name_original: Airborn Artistic II - A Second Take
description:
In "Flying Game of New Generation" you, the player, are invited to flap your wings and lead the winds of change, towards a bright new world. Choose the destiny of those around you, and perhaps find your own at the bottom of this "open hole flight simulation".

Made for one of those "Game Jam Clubs".
